Feedback

The basic feedback dialog is included as part of loading the common script file:

The feedback dialog binds itself to buttons/links with the attribute data-toggle set to feedback; the feedback links in the navbar and footer are defined this way.

Your site/application will need to also specify data-id and (optionally) data-m (default: "ht"). For example:

  • About
  • Collections
  • Help
  • Feedback
  • Mobile
  • Take-Down Policy
  • Privacy
  • Contact
